title: Sinatra
subtitle: A web app for building shareable Spotify music profiles
summary: A full-stack Spotify-linked web app that lets users build personalized music profiles, share taste insights, and visually explore their top genres, tracks, and playlists.

title: Cartara
subtitle: An AI-assisted visualizer of geopolitics and current events.
summary: Cartara is a map-based visualizer of geopolitics and current events that use modern APIs and LLMs to dynamically depict the world in action.
